name: Rule Breaker
description:
Rule Breaker because I don't know how to read directions and follow rules. 

Anyway my version of a Tigers Blood. 
Add koolada to taste for the snow cone coldness

I know dairy milk seems wierd but it's so low it works.. this has kinda been my white whale. And I am happy with this. It's not like the others, it's the way I like it

Dig it.
author: Tkiese92

reviews.text: !!!! Awesome !!!!  Very nice vape, good as a shake and vape too

I mixed this up last night but didnt have cap sweet watermelon so subbed with fw candy watermelon at same percent. This has to be the first fruity kinda of mix that has just blown my mind. This is absolutely amazing! So creamy yet so fruity at the same time. You did an amzing job with this one. Need to order more strawberry so i can mix a giant batch of this! Thanks for sharing!
I don't know tiger blood, so I don't know which profile this should hit, but I don't really get anything from this.
